column1: '''Quercetum''' or '''Oakley''' (in the Vulgar tongue) was a neighbouring village of [[Ham]] where [[Farmer Giles]] lived.  When the [[dragons#Other fiction|dragon]] [[Chrysophylax]] came to the [[Middle Kingdom]] initially he was far away and therefore not a great worry to the farmer.  However
column2: when Chrysophylax came to Quercetum and ate sheep
column6: the folk of Ham became alarmed and called upon Giles to save them. <ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
